titleStmt.title: Power from on high, or, The power of the Holy Ghost dispersed through the whole body of Christ, and communicated to each member according to its place and use in that body. Delivered in two sermons, on Acts 1.8. and now published, for the insturction [sic] and use of those that are spirituall. / By William Dell: minister of the gospel of Jesus Christ at Yelden in the county of Bedford.
titleStmt.author: Dell, William, d. 1664.

titleStmt.title: Power from on high, or, The power of the Holy Ghost dispersed through the whole body of Christ, and communicated to each member according to its place and use in that body. Delivered in two sermons, on Acts 1.8. and now published, for the insturction [sic] and use of those that are spirituall. / By William Dell: minister of the gospel of Jesus Christ at Yelden in the county of Bedford.
titleStmt.author: Dell, William, d. 1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
